title: Dx Glow - Watch Face
summary: Simplicity, bright lively colors, and neon glow inspire this watch face.
description: Features Fully customizable watch colors, date, battery display and more.Designed to work with Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatchControl this app from your phone/tablet or your android wear watch.Requirement Your Android WatchAndroid Wear (Google official wear app)If you prefer a different colors or see other themes:Our store on Google Play is:   http://goo.gl/taIyIaInformation: Support, comments, updatesWeb page:  https://plus.google.com/+MichaelAXoThemes/posts, http://www.xothemes.com •  Google community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/108429877838815336777•  Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/xothemesSincerely,Michael Aupublisher id: THAAUSDisclaimer:  Actual watch is not included.  Actual look may differ from displays depending on your watch brand.
descriptionHTML:
Features

Fully customizable watch colors, date, battery display and more.
Designed to work with Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch
Control this app from your phone/tablet or your android wear watch.

Requirement
Your Android Watch
Android Wear (Google official wear app)

If you prefer a different colors or see other themes:
Our store on Google Play is: http://goo.gl/taIyIa

Information: Support, comments, updates
Web page: https://plus.google.com/+MichaelAXoThemes/posts, http://www.xothemes.com
• Google community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/108429877838815336777
• Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/xothemes



Sincerely,
Michael Au
publisher id: THAAUS

Disclaimer: Actual watch is not included. Actual look may differ from displays depending on your watch brand.
comments: Very cool Love the look on my zenwatch 2 but can't read the date At all as its too dark.
It's good The first analog round watch face I like on ZenWatch
Date and battery is a bit too dark though
